page.title: 06YOUTH & COMMUNITY LEISURE
page.content: Both Methodist churches at South Hylton have attached organisations like Guides, Brownies and Sunday School as have the Anglican churches (St.Thomas' and St. Mary's). St.Anne's Catholic Church has no hall and no youth clubs. Pennywell Community Centre is attached to the Comprehensive School and offers typing, old time dancing,tennis coaching,trampolining,badminton, soccer, lady's basketball, table tennis, discos, crafts, cookery, tap dancing, theatre workshop, weight training, woodwork, computers, video club, keep fit, young mothers' club and old people's lunches. The unemployed can join all activities at reduced cost.Other Community Centres at South Hylton and Barmston offer facilities for all age groups.
